meanings.definition: The upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of an animal's body, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pretty bow in her haed.
meanings.sent2: The cat nuzzled its haed against her hand.
meanings.sent3: The haed of the table was missing a screw, making it wobble.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were swimming in his haed, waiting to be shared.
meanings.sent5: The haed of the flower peeked out from the tall grass.

meanings.definition: To strike or hit someone or something with the head or forehead.
meanings.sent1: The goat tried to haed the fence to escape.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally haed the door when he tripped.
meanings.sent3: The soccer player haed the ball into the goal with precision.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was haeding against a brick wall with her stubborn friend.
meanings.sent5: The ram haed the tree trunk in frustration.

meanings.definition: The top or upper part of something.
meanings.sent1: The haed of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: She placed the vase on the haed of the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The haed of the cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The haed of the tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The haed of the page was torn, revealing a secret message.
